title: 1.5L 110V/12V Electric Lunch Box Portable for Car Office Food Warmer Heater Container 40W
body_html:
Specification

Brand:BCBMALL

Details

Features:

Food Grade Material

The electric lunch box is made of food-grade PP plastic and 304 stainless steel, which is high-temperature resistant, non-toxic, durable, eco-friendly, and safe to use.

Heating Up Fast

Using PTC original constant temperature heating, low-consumption heat cycle to keep food at a suitable temperature and keep the moisture of the food. It normally takes 25-50 minutes to warm the food. (If the food was taken out of the fridge or where the ambient temperature is low, the heating time should be extended appropriately).

Healthy Meal Anywhere

No microwave required and wait in line for heating food. Now simply plug in and heat up your food at the office or in the car/truck using the 110/12V power cables. Enjoy your warm & healthier homemade food.

Leak Proof Cover

Improved cover design, the cover will not move during use, more tightly covered. Because a leak-proof seal ring design is added, it will prevent fluid leakage even when walking or in sloshing cars.

Easy to Clean

The electric lunch box meets the safety standards of dietary materials. The inner container is removable, therefore it is very easy to clean.

Portable Design

There is a portable handle on the lid, you can carry the food in the lunch box everywhere like in your car/truck and office. Also useful for picnics, road trips, camping, etc.

Warm Tips: Please do not clean the heating base with water, and do not add water to the heating base.

 

Specifications:

Type: Electric Lunch Box

Material: 304 Stainless Steel + Food Grade PP Plastic

Color: Gray + Green

Dimension: 9.3 x 6.6 x 4.3 in

Stainless Steel Bowl Dimension: 8.3 x 5.7 x 2.7 in

Power Cord Length: 31.5 in

Power Cord (Car) Length: 32.5 in

Capacity: 1.5L

Heating Time: 25-50 min

Power: 110V/ 50Hz / 40W

 

Package Included:

1 x Electric Lunch Box

1 x Stainless Steel Spoon

1 x Stainless Steel Fork

1 x Stainless Steel Container

1 x Plastic Compartment Box

1 x Power Cord

1 x Power Cord for Car

1 x Manual

If you need a bag, choose the lunch bag or lunch box+bag option.

In the summer, it's very comfortable to organize activities or lie down outdoor, however, there's definitely a premise: you need a piece of shade to protect your skin from the sun. Here comes a outdoor patio solar LED umbrella, which provides you with such a large shade to enjoy the beautiful life of summer.

[Description]

This is a product that has sun-proof function and sturdy construction with 32 solar LED lights. Even on the sunniest day, you can enjoy your outdoor living spaces and remain cooler by using this Patio Sun Shading Umbrella. It is probably the best way to stay outside without absorbing the harmful UV rays of sun, which causes serious sunburns or even skin cancers. Large and opulent, our offset umbrella complements your outdoor space with its wide arching canopy and elegant iron framework. The modern design was created to fit seamlessly in areas such as outdoor seating spaces for patio, garden,office buildings, restaurant and commercial businesses.

This 10x10Ft gazebo provides spacious space and is fitted with four-sided mesh for insect protection and wind and rain protection.With it you will enjoy a comfortable and relaxing courtyard life with your family and friends.

Large Space Canopy: This 10x10 gazebo provides enough shade for you and your family's daily leisure activities.You can place a dining table or a set of sofas inside the gazebo, which can accommodate 5-6 people for outdoor entertainment for you and your friends. High Quality Structure: The frame is made of powder-coated steel,which is sturdy and anti-rust.All four legs are triangular frames made of iron pipes to provide stable support and allow for the placement of small objects. High Quality Fabric: The gazebo Top cloth made of high quality polyester cloth, waterproof and sunscreen, strong and durable. Double-Tiered Top: The double-layer gazebo canopy roof design can increase stability, prevent severe water accumulation and maintain ventilation. Removable Mesh: The gazebo is equipped with four-sided mesh, which prevents outdoor insects from entering the tent and keeps the air flowing.You can also remove the mesh when you don't need it. Highlights

Versatile Air Fryer Oven: This air fryer oven can be used not only as an air fryer oven but also as an air-fryer, dehydrator, rotisserie, pizza grill, etc. The air fryer oven will fulfill your varied cooking needs by making a wide range of dishes.

Oil-free and Healthy Cooking Mode: Compared to the conventional way of cooking with hot oil, the air fryer oven uses 360 ° hot air circulation to cook food, which reduces fat by up to 85%.

Large Capacity and Safety Guarantee: 12.7-quarter of cooking space allows you to prepare enough gourmet meals. In order to prevent plastic odors, the FDA and ETL certified air fryer oven are made of stainless steel. And non-slip feet, heat-resistant housing, pause feature will further ensure safety.

Easy-to-operate and Convenient Design: 2 rotating knobs can help you control the time from 0 to 60 minutes and the temperature from 215 ° F to 425 ° F. Transparent window and interior lighting make it easier to monitor food when cooking.

Complete Cooking Accessories: It comes with 10 useful cooking accessories including a rotisserie shaft, 2 rotisserie forks, a skewer rack, a rotating mesh basket, 2 wire rack, a mesh basket, drip tray, rotisserie rack.

Details

Description

This air fryer oven is designed with a hot air circulation system for a healthier way of cooking, enabling you to eat delicious food without added fat or calories.

 

Just rotate two knobs you can set the time and temperature easily. The transparent window and inside light make it easy to see the cooking progress of your food at any time. The large capacity of 12.7 quarts allows you to cook a variety of foods at the same time to meet the needs of the entire family. With a rotating function, it is perfect for cooking a turkey. The interior of the oven is made of stainless steel to avoid the unpleasant smell of plastic, and it has been multi-certified so it is very safe to use.

 

If you are looking for an air fryer oven, don't hesitate to buy it!

This vacuum cleaner is designed for cleaning on most types of floors, including hardwood, tile, laminate, marble floors and thin short carpets (<0.5 inch). It looses, extracts, and vacuums in dirt, pet fur, food crumbs and fine dust.

Cleans wherever your pet goes
Automatically picks up pet hair on the floor wherever your pet plays with the efficient 3-stage cleaning system. Dual side brushes reach closer to corners & edges, a V-shape roller brush helps gathering more dust, and the max 1200pa suction ensures a quick yet powerful vacuuming

A mopping robot vacuum
DT966 comes with a 350ml dust bin, as well as a 350ml large water tank, designed to mop floors quickly and efficiently. Just attach the mopping pad, press the START button, and let it mop your floors! Please do not use the mopping function on carpets or rugs.

title: 2 in 1 Bohrfutter Ratsche Spanner Wrench Bohrmaschine Spann Werkzeug Chuck Key Bohrer Pressen Multi Universal Power Hammer dril
body_html:
[Features]:
1. Made von hoher qualität stahl, verschleiß beständig und hat eine lange lebensdauer. Die griff ist nicht-slip und angenehm zu halten.
2. verwenden zu anziehen oder lösen sie die spannfutter. Perfekt für die meisten elektrische bohrer und power werkzeuge.
3. verwendet für steuerung dichtheit der lockerheit von bohrmaschine spann werkzeug.
4. kann verwendet werden in hammer oder bohren modus, sehr langlebig, angenehm zu greifen.
5. typ A Bohrer Chuck vier Kopf Bohrer Chuck Key, geeignet für die meisten bohrer und power werkzeuge.
6. typ C und D ist 2 in 1 Ratsche, die ratsche funktion macht ändern der bohrer mehr effiziente.
Mit eine positive und negative ratsche schalter, es können drehen vorwärts-und rückwärts, und schnell lösen und ziehen sie die bohrfutter, die ist einfach und bequem.
7. typ D ist für bank bohrer.
[Notizen]:Erlauben sie bitte 1-3cm messung abweichung wegen des manuellen messung.

title: 2 Pack Portable Travel LCD Digital Hanging Luggage Scale Electronic Weight 110lb 5core LSS-004 2pcs
body_html:
Product Description


 

Tare function

The tare/zero function allows you to measure exactly what you want to measure. No more, no less. Set zero to where you want it with the ease to re-calibrate without hassle.

5 Core 110lbs Luggage Scale Digital Perfect for Travel

For travelers:

Small and handy. Take it on your adventure without the hassle of extra space.

The plastic with high resistance structured rubber handle offers a powerful durability to withstand heavy weight of the luggage.

Easy to handle with a sturdy metal hook and nylon strap.

  • Easy to read large LCD sceen
  • Capacity: 110lbs
  • Graduation: 0.1lb
  • Battary included
  • Auto-Lock
  • Auto-off

Tare function

When using a container, you should first hang the container on the belt, press the ON / TARE button to reset 0 lbs, and then place the goods in the container. You can get the net weight of the goods.

Easy to Carry

It is small, portable design delivers mighty durability to withstand the heavy weights of your travels. Take it on your adventures, or store it without the hassle of added bulk.

Battary Included

Easy to install and discharge Long-time use lithium battery

Package Includes:

 

  • 1 x Digital luggage scale
  • 1 x 3V Battary
  • 1 x User Manual

 

Easy to use for single hand or double hands

Use single hand for 0-30 lbs light weight Use duoble hands for 30-110lbs heavy weight Plesae do not use the scale for over 110lbs Please be careful when you are using the scale for heavy weight. Auto-off functions , auto-lock display

Comfortable use

T-sharp design allows you to feel comfortable while using the scale. The hanging hook is made of stainless steel. With the high quality manufacturing standard, the hook won't rub your luggage away. Please be careful when using the heavy weight scale

Turn off

The luggage scale switches off automatically 30 seconds after weighing. If you want to switch off the luggage scale manually, you can press ON / TARE for 2 seconds to switch it off.


Extra Feature

 

 

Temperature Display (℉/℃)

 

 

Your own built-in portable travel thermometer!

 

 

Packet content

 

 

1* Portable Luggage Scale

 

 

1*CR2032 Battery

 

 

1* User Manual

Details

Relax and enjoy with your family and friends in your outdoor space on this poly rattan patio lounge set with cushions!

 

  • Modular design: This design makes it possible to place the seat in any arrangement or combine it with other modular segments to meet your needs!
  • Premium material: The patio lounge set is designed with water-resistant PE rattan, making it hard-wearing and suitable for daily outdoor use.

  • Comfortable cushions: Made of fabric, the thickly padded and removable cushions are soft to touch and bring you extra comfort.

 

Note:

  • In order to extend the life of your outdoor furniture, we recommend you to clean it regularly and do not leave it outdoors without protection unnecessarily.
  • Clean: Use a mild soap solution.
  • Storing: If possible, store in a cool, dry place indoors. If the product is stored outdoors, protect it with a waterproof cover. Wipe and dry the excess water or snow from flat surfaces after a rain or snowfall. Allow sufficient air circulation to avoid moisture-related damage.

2-Piece All-Weather PE Wicker Conversation Set Rattan Sofa Set Outdoor Patio Half-moon Sectional Furniture Set w/ Side Table for Umbrella, Gray Rattan+Gray Cushion

 

Sturdy Solid Frame with All-Weather PE Rattan

This patio sofa set includes a 1pc 2-person armchair sofa and 1pc half-moon chair or sofa as well as 2 thick pillows& 3 cushions. Constructed with a solid steel frame, each seat can hold a max of 250lbs. Covered by strong but light-weighted PE rattan, this 3pcs rattan sofa set is designed to be all-weathered with UV resistant and water-resistant.

Multifunctional Tables

For your convenience, the conversation armchair is designed to be multipurpose. The middle arm is with an umbrella hole which will be practical for adding some coolness in hot weather. Enjoy your summertime with a bottle of icy beverage and a shady umbrella! (Warm Notice: Umbrella is not included.)

Comfortable Upgraded Pillows and Cushions

Compared with others, our cushions for the sectional rattan furniture are up to 2.8inch thick. For all pillows and cushions, they come with zippers so that the covers can be removed easily for washing. Besides, the fan-shaped cushion is fixed by a button on the frame for anti-slipping. Warm Notice: For a long time using, hand-cleaning is recommended. Sewn by wear-resisting polyester fabric, the covers are water-resistant and UV-resistant.

How to Maintain Your Set

For longevity, we don’t recommend exposing them during inclement weather. Cushions and pillows should be stored and covered when not in use to protect them from rain, sunlight, and other staining agents.

Highlights

Stable and Durable: Patio swing is made of steel frame, which ensures large weight capacity(approx: 750lbs) and sturdy construction. Powder-coated finish and polyester fabric provides long-lasting enjoyment for years to come.

Waterproof and UV protection: Polyester and oxford cloth is waterproof and powder-coated finish is rust-resistant. You can leave the swing outdoors after late-night barbeques and gatherings. In sunny days canopy will protect you from sun’s harmful UV rays.

Adjustable canopy: The angle of canopy can be adjusted from 0-45 degree to adapt to sunlight in different directions. With such adjustable canopy provides better cool shade. If you are in the mood for sunbathing, remove it.

Soft cushions and Feet pads: Soft cushions (pillows in the pic are not included)with 3-person seating is perfect for socializing with friends or enjoying summertime with family. The patio swing constructs plastic anti-skid feet pads.

title: 3-In-1 Patio 10 Gallon Ice Cube Cooler Box Table Stool Storage W/Handle
body_html:
Highlights

Featuring excellent sealing property, this cooler is able to keep drinks cool for more than 24 hours so as to satisfy your basic refrigeration need. It’s worth mentioning that we have had a 24-hour temperature retention test and the ice only melted by a third.

This ice chest comes with 10 gallon (37 L) inner space to accommodate multiple beers, beverages, fruits and more, which is enough to entertain a group of friends. Besides, the removable lid brings you great convenience to fetch drinks from the cooler.

In addition to being used as a ice cooler, it can serve as a cocktail side table as well, which is rather convenient for you to put drinks and mobile phone on the detachable lid. Besides, with a strong weight capacity of 220 lbs, you can also treat it as a stool when in need.

Measuring 17" x 17" x 16" (L x W x H), this cooler occupies very little space and can be easily placed into the trunk of car, allowing you to take it when camping, fishing, BBQ, holding a family gathering, etc.

Made of high-quality PP material with waterproof surface, this portable ice cooler is not easy to deform or fade, ensuring you a long-lasting service life.

Details

Specifications

Color: Black/Brown                                                                  Material: PP

Overall dimension: 17" x 17" x 16"                                          Net weight: 8 lbs

Storage capacity: 10 Gallon                                                     Weight capacity: 220 lbs

Package includes: 1 x Ice cooler

 

 

Key Features

Long-term Cooling Time: Featuring excellent sealing property, this cooler is able to keep drinks cool for more than 24 hours so as to satisfy your basic refrigeration need. It’s worth mentioning that we have had a 24-hour temperature retention test and the ice only melted by a third.

 

Large Capacity: This ice chest comes with 10 gallon (37 L) inner space to accommodate multiple beers, beverages, fruits and more, which is enough to entertain a group of friends. Besides, the removable lid brings you great convenience to fetch drinks from the cooler.

 

3-in-1 Multipurpose Cooler: In addition to being used as a ice cooler, it can serve as a cocktail side table as well, which is rather convenient for you to put drinks and mobile phone on the detachable lid. Besides, with a strong weight capacity of 220 lbs, you can also treat it as a stool when in need.

 

Portable Design: Measuring 17" x 17" x 16" (L x W x H), this cooler occupies very little space and can be easily placed into the trunk of car, allowing you to take it when camping, fishing, BBQ, holding a family gathering, etc. Better yet, the 8-pound lightweight cooler is equipped with built-in handles to help you carry it with ease.

 

Durable Material: Made of high-quality PP material with waterproof surface, this portable ice cooler is not easy to deform or fade, ensuring you a long-lasting service life. In addition, the surface designed with exquisite imitated wood grain makes the cooler a stylish addition to your outdoor space while increasing a touch of nature.

 

Description

Our 3-in-1 multipurpose ice cooler is a good choice for outdoor time.
With large storage capacity and good sealing, this 10 gallon no-need-plug-in ice cooler can keep your drinks cool for more than 24 hours, making it a useful companion for BBQ, family gathering camping, fishing, and more. Meanwhile, you can use it as a cocktail side table or a stool to make your outdoor activities more convenient.

Besides, the compact cooler weighs only 8 lbs and is designed with built-in handles, so you can easily carry it anywhere you go. Furthermore, the PP material has great durability and water-resistance, allowing you to use our ice chest for many years.

title: 3-piece Outdoor Wicker Sofa Patio Furniture Set, L-shaped Corner Sofa, Water And UV Protected, Two Glass Table, Adjustable Feet And 3.1" Thicker Cushion, Light Gray Cushion and Beige Wicker
body_html:
Highlights

This wicker sofa set consists of sturdy iron frame, tempered glass, simulated plastic wicker and cloud-soft cushions. The combination of those powerful properties makes this product an incomparable advantage as a group of outdoor furniture.

Specification

Material:Wicker

Details

3-piece Outdoor Wicker Sofa Patio Furniture Set, L-shaped Corner Sofa, Water And UV Protected, Two Glass Table, Adjustable Feet And 3.1" Thicker Cushion, Light Gray Cushion and Beige Wicker

 

Unique Double Glass Table

This wicker sofa set has two transparent glass countertops to fully meet your placement needs. They rest securely on the sturdy wicker table, linked via suction cups. Plus, the tables are topped with a tempered glass surface that's perfect for placing down drinks, while also allowing a sophisticated touch. A good choice is for 4 to 5 friends to have a drink and relax and enjoy an outdoor party together.

 

L-shaped Corner Sofa

The L-shaped corner sofa with the iron leg structure of this wicker sofa set is one of the biggest features. The sturdy cross bar under the sofa for reasonable bearing ability. A variety of placement methods are suitable for any corner of the home. Another feature is the natural beige paired with elegant gray suitable for any style and match, will bring your outdoor life fresh and natural beauty.

 

High Stability

Both tables and sofas come with adjustable feet, and they can also be height-adjusted by rotating for high stability even on uneven ground. Those connectors are also very strong and not easy to loosen.

 

Features

The unique beige wicker is hand-woven to bring you the most authentic and natural comfort. Those cushions are made of a special spill-resistant material fabric that is waterproof, UV-proof and corrosion-proof for many years to use. And the tempered glass surface for no-scratch. They only need a rag to keep them clean and tidy. While those pillows are equipped with zippers and only need a simple cleaning.

 

Detailed Tutorial

We attach a detailed installation tutorial, which can be completed by 1~2 adults in about 1hour. The installation process is very simple and the logical instruction manual with clear illustrations assists users to complete the installation process smoothly. This set is carefully packed in 3 flat packages, ensuring safe and secure shipping. Please be patient as these 3 packages may not be received at the same time.

Highlights

Sturdy & Durable: 1.5mm thick tubular heavy duty metal firewood rack with double black powder coating on the surface, which provides strong support for storing logs. Perfect to store wood in your tools room.

Large Capacity: The size of the 4’ firewood rack is 48’’x48’’x14’’, which can store about 350 lbs of logs. The size of the 8’ firewood rack is 96’’x48’’x14’’, which can store about 650 lbs of logs. Fits on outdoor porch, back yard deck, outside fire pits, under eaves, on patios, or put it on a har

Easy to Assemble: The outdoor firewood rack comes with all hardware and manual, simply put the all parts together in minutes. It’s easy to install.

Keep Logs Dry: The firewood rack is designed with a storage layer height of 6.7’’ to keep the lowest logs at a sufficient distance from the ground, which will provide better airflow and keep the logs dry.

Please Kindly Note: When stacking logs, please place the firewood rack on a hard and level ground. Do not overloaded the firewood rack. When it rains or snows, please cover with a suitable protective cover to protect the logs from getting wet and to protect the normal service life of the firewood

title: 4PCS Solar Pineapple LED Lights Waterproof Hanging Lantern Garden Decor 60 LEDs
body_html:
Details

*Description*
-Outdoor Decor Pineapple Solar Lights are cute with the green leaves. A warm amber glow specially for night strolls, nighttime gatherings or festive ceremony, add more grace to life.

-The Solar LED Light Solar would make a great addition to any garden and patio or a great gift

-The modern design will make this decorative light stand out from the rest and because of its design and fantastic attraction.

-Perfect for lawn, porch, garden, patio, yard, hall, roof, living room, bedroom,porch,patio etc.

-The warm white flash light helps to create a romantic atmosphere.

-After fully charging, the light turns on automatically when it gets dark.

*Charge and Installation Recommendation*
-Place the solar light fixture in an area where it can receive direct sunlight for at least 6-8 hours each day, leave the switch to "ON" position.Shadowed locations will not allow the battery to charge fully and will reduce the hours of nighttime lighting. The selected location should NOT be near nighttime light sources, as they may cause the solar light to turn off prematurely. The light works for 8-10h if fully charged.

-Duration of light depends on solar product's level of sunlight exposure, geographical locations,weather conditions and the length of daytime.

-Keep the solar panel clean and direct sunlight.

SPECIFICATION:

- Material: ABS + Stainless Steel

- Powered Source: Solar Powered

- IP Rating: IP65 Waterproof

- LED Quantity: 60 LEDs

-Charging Time: 6-8 hours (when getting enough sunlight)

-Working Time: 8-10 hours after fully charged

PACKAGE CONTENT:

-4 x Solar pineapple lights

Details

5 Pieces All-Weather Brown PE Rattan Wicker Sofa Set Outdoor Patio Sectional Furniture Set Half-Moon Sofa Set with Tempered Glass Table

 

Sturdy Solid Frame with All-Weather PE Rattan

This patio sofa set includes 4pcs 2-person sofa and 1 half-moon tempered glass top table as well as 8 thick pillows&4 cushions. Constructed with solid steel frame, each seat can hold max 250lbs. Covered by strong but light-weighted PE rattan, this 5pcs rattan sofa set is designed to all-weathered with UV resistant and water-resistant.

 

Comfortable Upgraded Pillows and Cushions

Compared with others, our cushions for the sectional rattan furniture are up to 2.8inch thickness. For all pillows and cushions, they are come with pillows so that the covers can be removed easily for washing. Warm Notice: For long time using, hand-cleaning is recommend. Sewn by wear-resisting polyester fabric, the covers are water-resistant and UV-resistant.

 

Multifunctional and Free Combination

For all parts of this 5-piece rattan sofa set, they can be combined with different shapes for different usages. With this outdoor set, it will provide premium comfort while enjoying your party in the sunset or having a coffee after lunch.

 

How to Maintain Your Set

For longevity, we don’t recommend exposing them during inclement weather. Cushions and pillows should be stored and covered when not in use to protect them from rain,sunlight, and other staining agents.

1. es sind zwei beleuchtung modi, eine ist die lange licht modus und die andere ist die gesture sensing modus. In die sensing modus, sie können schalten sie die lichter oder schalten sie die lichter mit eine welle von hand.


Die bestrahlung bereich ist 2,30 meter, und es ist sehr helle innerhalb 10 meter.


3. Light gewicht, leicht zu tragen, mit usb-schnittstelle, einfach zu laden.

5. überladung schutz design, voll von automatische power off.


6. es kann bei 180 grad und hat eine breite bestrahlung bereich.


7. Clip-on-design, die können abgeschnitten werden in einen hut oder mantel, oder verwendet, wenn reiten ein fahrrad in der nacht, ist geeignet für outdoor-aktivitäten, wie angeln, camping, klettern, reisen, etc., und kann auch verwendet werden als arbeits licht für reparatur autos oder andere arbeit.

[Enjoy the Company of Family and Friends]

With two love seats, one corner sofa, two long benches, and one big table, this patio sectional sofa set can accommodate multiple people, providing all you need for gatherings with your family members and friends.

 

[Ultra-Comfortable & Easy-Care Cushions]

2.5-inch-thick seat cushions, 8.3-inch extra-thick back cushions gently angled back, and ergonomic armrests offer you irresistibly decadent relaxation. The outdoor sofa covers can easily come off with the smooth pull of a zipper for easy washing.

 

[All Weather Wicker and Sturdy Constructions]

body_html:

Details

 

6L 1700W Digital Screen Air Fryer US Plug

Features:

  • [Large capacity, high power] This 6-liter air fryer can easily hold 800 grams of chicken nuggets or 8 cakes, which is a necessity for a family of 2-7 people. The power of up to 1700W greatly reduces the cooking time and saves time. When you get home from get off work, just put the seasoned food in the air fryer, press the preset button, and when the bell rings after 30 minutes, you can taste the delicious food. [Healthy and oil-free] Thanks to the 360° circulating hot air system, we can bake food quickly and evenly. Compared with traditional ovens, it can reduce oil by 80%. It is an essential product for a healthy life.

  • [Multi-function screen] Stylish and easy-to-use multi-function screen with 6 single-food cooking presets (frozen french fries/homemade french fries/drumsticks/chicken/fish/steak) and functions of preheating, reheating, keeping warm and defrosting . We can select preset options from the menu button, start with one click, or adjust the temperature and time according to personal recipes.

  • [Safe, convenient and clean] The air fryer has an accident prevention function. If you accidentally open the air fryer, it can automatically stop cooking to ensure your safety. The inner pot of the air fryer can be safely used in the dishwasher, so you can reduce your time in the kitchen and spend more time with your family.

  • [Healthy and oil-free] Thanks to the 360° circulating hot air system, we can bake food quickly and evenly. Compared with traditional ovens, it can reduce oil by 80%. It is an essential product for a healthy life.

Details

6PCS Outdoor Patio Sectional All-Weather PE Wicker Rattan Sofa Set with Glass Table, Blue Cushion+ Brown Wicker

 

6PCS Patio Sofa Set
This graceful patio sofa set comes with 1 armless chair, 2 Corner chairs,1 Armchair, 1 ottoman,1 tempered glass table,6 back pillows and 6 seat cushions. For all sections of this 6-piece rattan set, they can be organized in any shape to meet different usages. Enjoy your leisure time with this set in the sunset or in holiday or at parties.
Multifunctional Glass Table
Don't wanna table? What we offer is a special design to meet your request just by an extra cushion. With this cushion, it can be put on the glass directly so the table can be an ottoman easily. Or to keep safe, the glass can also be removed. Combine the chair with an ottoman so it can be a chaise longue to make your legs relaxed.
All-Weather Rattan Set
Made of strong but light-weight PE rattan wicker, this patio sofa set is designed to be all-weathered with UV resistant and water-resistant. Constructed with galvanized steel frame, the set will be enough strong for years of use. Warm Notice: still do not recommend leaving the set out in inclement weather for longevity.
Upgraded Cushions and Pillows
Compared with other cushions, what we offer are cushions up to 2.8-inch thickness with zippers. Come with zippers, and cushions' covers are easy to be removed and washed.Pls, note that recommend to wash by hand for a long time using. Besides, all of the covers are made of superior fabric which is fade-resistant and water-resistant.

body_html:
Highlights

Elevate your next gameday party. This portable bar table allows your guests to grab chilled beverages while never being far from any of the action.

Lid elevates upwards 10 inches above the rim for use as a patio bar table. The top reveals a hidden cooler with 7.5-gallon capacity. Keep up to forty 12 oz. cans ice cold.

When not being used as a party bar, shut the top and use as a patio coffee table. When elevated, it is the ideal height for use as a hot tub table so you will always have a spot for your drink, snacks, and phone.

The thick exterior resin prevents rusting, peeling, and denting in all weather conditions, rain, or shine.

Built in drainage plug makes cleanup a breeze. After the party is over and the ice is melted, simply pull the plug to drain the cooler and let it dry before putting it away until next time.

title: Acrylglasbild - Inner Harmony [Glass]
body_html:
Acrylglasbild "Inner Harmony [Glass]" ist eine exzellente Idee für die Ausstattung von modernen Innenräumen. Passt perfekt zu den originellen Lösungen und ist eine interessante Alternative für traditionelle Wanddekorationen z.B. als Glaspaneele oder dekoratives Glas für die Küche. Druck auf Acrylglas zieht den Blick auf sich, dank efektvoller Tiefe und sieht wunderschön im Repräsentationszimmer aus. Dank der Anwendung moderner Technologien des Drucks und der Farbstoffe von hoher Qualität, charakterisiert es sich mit wunderschönem Glanz. Acrylglasbilder sind leicht, abwaschbar und unempfindlich gegen Feuchtigkeitseinwirkung, dank dem bewähren sie sich exzellent sowohl im Salon, Schlafzimmer, Bad, und sogar auf der Terasse. Acrylglas mit Grafik gewinnt dank der Lichtdurchlässigkeit einen unglaublichen 3D Effekt.
Acrylglasbilder bewahren alle Vorteile des klassischen Drucks auf Glas, bei der Meidung seiner schwachen Seiten – Schwere und Feinheit. Sie werden hergestellt aus einem Material, das besonders in der Inneraumarchitektur geschätzt wird: Polymethylmethacrylat. Polymer umgangsprachlich Acrylglas oder Plexiglas genannt, ist ähnlich wie Glas, farblos und hart. So wie Glas bleicht es unter der Einwirkung der UV-Strahlung nicht aus und hat eine Eigenschaft von sehr hoher Lichtdurchlässigkeit (mehr als 90%). Im Unterschied zu Glas ist es um die Hälfte leichter und definitiv widerstandsfähiger. Er ist elastischer und schwer zu brechen. Im Fall von Bildern auf Glas der Druck wird angebracht als Beschichtungsfolie. Diese Technik sichert eine fotografische Genauigkeit und gesättigte Farben. Bild auf Plexi garantiert eine dreidiemensionale Tiefe und einen feinen Glanz.
Druck auf Acryl ist ein exzellenter Vorschlag für diejenigen die praktische Lösungen mögen.

Hohe Wiederstandsfähigkeit
Acrylglas im Gegensatz zu Glas ist wiederstandsfähiger gegen Schäden und hat hohen Verformungswiederstand.

Hohe Lichtdurchlässigkeit
Hohe Transparenz von Acryl sichert eine glänzende Oberfläche und größere Farbenintensität.

Kindersicheres Produkt
Hergestellt aus unzerbrechlichem Material.

Glatte Oberfläche
Oberfläche des Acrylglases bleibt glatt und ist kratzfest.

Bildinstallation
Nimmt nur wenige Minuten in Anspruch und ist unglaublich einfach und effektvoll, dank unsichtbaren Haken die sich auf der Rückseite des Bildes befinden. Im hinteren Teil befinden sich auch Anschlagpuffer, die eine stabilisierende und absichernde Funktion erfüllen. Befestigungselemente im Set.

Leichter als Glas
Acrylglas ist 50% leichter als traditionelles Glas.

Zusätzlicher UV-Schutz
Angewendete Farben sind wiederstandsfähig gegen die Einwirkung von Sonnenlicht.

Teil-Größe:100x50: 20x30 20x40 20x50 20x40 20x30200x100: 40x60 40x80 40x100 40x80 40x60

LARGE CAPACITY CONVECTION OVEN Inner Tank Size: 19 QT - 11.4 (Width) * 10.2 (Depth) * 9.8 (Height) inches.With the WEESTA Air Fry Oven you can also get:1*Oven Rack,1*Baking Pan,1*Air Fryer Basket,1*Oven Gripperand 1*Crumb Tray (pre-installed).

No Preheating - WEESTA Air fryer toaster oven applies Cubic Hot Wind Circulation Technology. You don't need to flip your food or toss the air fry basket in the middle of cooking.

Details

WEESTA 5-IN-1 Air Fryer OvenAir Frying,Air Roasting,Toasting,Broiling and Baking.WEESTA 5-IN-1 Air Fryer Toaster Oven satisfy all your needs which is able to cook: a 6 lbs. whole chicken, a 9-inch pizza, 1 lb. frozen fries, 2 lbs. chicken wings, 4 slices of bread,roast vegetables, dehydrate jerky and fruit & more.

Let's Fry Away!

IMPORTANT NOTICE:

- The crumb tray is pre-installed in the drawer-like part at the bottom of the oven. We fixed it with some pieces of tapes to avoid accidental falling or damage during transportation. After receiving the oven, please slightly lift up the front side of the oven to remove the tapes and take out the crumb tray!

- Before leaving the factory, all the heating elements were coated with protective oil to prevent oxidation during transportation and storage, which may seriouly affect oven's working performance. Before the first use, please take out all the accessories first, then turn the oven to the highest temperature and keep it working for at least 10 to 15 minutes to evaporate and remove the protective oil.

-Our instructions and recipes are still being continuously optimized and update. The latest instructions and recipes will be sent to your email within 2-3 days after you place the order. They are also can be downloaded on the product details page: the user Guide are our instructions, and the User Manual is our recipes. If you can not download them, please tell us. We have been dedicated and dedicated, hoping to bring you satisfactory service.

Spin & Go! - Simple to Use

What is the most important thing in the kitchen?

Simple & Quick.

Unlike electronically controlled air fryer, we stick to the classic mechanical control system. You no longer need to repeatedly press those insensitive electronic buttons on the control panel when adjusting the time and temperature, nor to flip the food or toss the air fry basket in the middle of cooking.

Better Way to Enjoy Our Meals!

Can't resist the temptation of deep fried food but concern about health problems?

Don't worry, WEESTA's here!

With our "Cubic Hot Wind Circulation Technology", WEESTA air fryer toaster oven is able to make your food's texture and taste just like deep fried but with 85% less oil. Yummy, but no guilty!

Multifunctional - ALL in One

 

Function:

Air Fry: 4 upper heating elements and the fan are functional

Air Roast: 2 upper heating elements and the fan are functional

Toast: 2 upper heating elements and 2 lower heating elements are functional

Broil: 4 upper heating elements are functional

Bake: 2 lower heating elements are functional

Temperature Range: Room Temperature to 450°F

Timer Range: 0 to 60 minutes

Temperature Control: Mechanical Dial

Volume: 19QT

Power: 1300W

Accessories Included: 1*Oven Rack, 1*Baking Pan, 1*Air Fryer Basket, 1*Oven Gripper, 1*Crumb Tray (pre-installed)

19QT Family Size Capacity

With the 3-layers 19QT capacity inner tank, WEESTA air fryer toaster oven can cook the food for all your familyDouble Glass Door

The double glass door can lock the heat inside the oven and keep the temperature of the inner tank more stable.
